fish.payara.micro

Interface PayaraInstance

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PayaraInstanceImpl

    @Contract
public interface PayaraInstance
    An instance of this class can be Injected into any application that is running on Payara Micro. It provides similar methods as the PayaraMicroRuntime
    Author:
    Steve Millidge (Payara Foundation)
